name: mern-testing-workspace
description: Comprehensive MERN stack testing workspace with Jest, React Testing Library, Supertest, and Cypress

scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:server:unit && npm run test:client:unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:server:integration && npm run test:client:integration
scripts.test:all: npm run test:server:coverage && npm run test:client:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:server:coverage && npm run test:client:coverage
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run test

author: MERN Testing Workspace
